Jan. 10. Young man, ambitious, reliable, willing to travel, fully
familiar with all phases of studio operational television and tele¬
cine room operations including training in directing, producing and
lighting seeks a position which will utilize these abilities. Salary
secondary.
Jan. 11. STOP!!! You say you’re looking for a young, ambitious
and married man with a good speaking voice, who can sing and play
16 instruments; who can do an announcing or HC job, as well as
production work and who will travel? If you’re interested -— "JUST
LOOK ME UP, ANYTIME”....
Jan. 12. Young man, vet, M.S. degree seeks opportunity in the
field of education or associated field. Willing to learn or tackle
any job.
Jan. 13. Lucky combinations do bring success! Here is the happy
combination you may be looking for ... 7 years teaching, over a
year as a commercial radio announcer, over 76 TV programs produced
in education over a commercial station. Can you ase my services
as a producer or consultant during the summer months?
